store.title: Connect Your Store

store.integrationSubtitle: Please provide the details for your {{platform}} website.

terms.accept: I agree to the terms and conditions and authorize XBlog to access my store

guide.title: Integration Guide

dashboard.scheduleArticlePrompt: Schedule your next article to maintain consistent content publishing

regenerate.label: Regenerations
regenerate.info: Regenerations allow you to recreate content. Each regeneration decreases your available count.
regenerate.notEnough: No regenerations available. Please upgrade your plan for more.
regenerate.upgradeMessage: Upgrade your plan to get more regenerations.
regenerate.error: Failed to use regeneration. Please try again.
regenerate.confirmMessage: Regenerating the table of contents will override your current sections and consume one regeneration credit from your balance.

example.title: Regeneration System Example
example.description: This is an example of how to use the regeneration system. You have {{count}} regenerations available.
example.contentDescription: This is some example content that can be regenerated.

points.label: Points
points.info: Points are used when generating content with AI. Each generation costs points based on the type of content.
points.notEnough: Not enough points for this operation
points.generationRequires: Generating {{type}} requires {{points}} points. You have {{remaining}} points remaining.
points.upgradeMessage: Upgrade your plan to get more points or wait for your points to refresh.

tooltips.articleType: Choose the type of article that best fits your content goals
tooltips.articleSize: Determines the length and depth of your article
tooltips.toneOfVoice: Sets the overall tone and style of writing for your article
tooltips.pointOfView: Determines the perspective from which your article is written
tooltips.aiContentCleaning: Controls how AI-generated text is processed to sound more natural
tooltips.imageQuality: Sets the resolution and quality of generated images
tooltips.imagePlacement: Determines where images will be placed within your article
tooltips.imageStyle: Sets the visual style for generated images
tooltips.numberOfImages: Total number of images to include in your article
tooltips.numberOfVideos: Specify how many videos should be embedded in your article
tooltips.internalLinking: Select which of your websites to link to within the article
tooltips.externalLinking: Choose which external sources to reference in your article or type your own

error.title: Something went wrong
error.message: We encountered an unexpected error. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
error.reportIssue: If this issue persists, please report it to our support team.

templates.title: Article Templates
templates.subtitle: Choose from our SEO-optimized templates to create high-quality content
templates.locked_message: Templates feature is currently in development and will be available soon. Stay tuned for updates!
templates.unlock_message: This feature will be available in the next update. Thank you for your patience!

status.pending: This check is waiting for you to fill in required fields
status.error: This item needs attention to improve your SEO score
status.warning: This item could be improved for better SEO
status.success: This item is optimized for SEO

toast.optimization_not_available: Optimization not available for this item yet.
toast.not_ready: This item is not ready for optimization yet.
toast.optimization_failed: Failed to optimize {{field}}. Please try again.

keyword_in_title.description: Focus keyword used in the SEO title
keyword_in_title.success: Focus keyword is used in the SEO title.
keyword_in_title.error: Focus keyword is not present in the SEO title.

keyword_in_meta.description: Focus keyword used in the meta description
keyword_in_meta.success: Focus keyword is in the meta description.
keyword_in_meta.error: Focus keyword is not in the meta description.

keyword_in_url.description: Focus keyword used in the URL
keyword_in_url.success: Focus keyword is used in the URL.
keyword_in_url.error: Focus keyword is not used in the URL.

keyword_in_first_10.description: Focus keyword appears in the first 10% of the content
keyword_in_first_10.success: Focus keyword appears within the first 10% of the content.
keyword_in_first_10.error: Focus keyword does not appear in the first 10% of the content.

keyword_in_content.description: Focus keyword found in the content
keyword_in_content.success: Focus keyword is found throughout the content.
keyword_in_content.error: Focus keyword is not found in the content.

keyword_in_subheadings.description: Focus keyword used in the subheadings
keyword_in_subheadings.success: Focus keyword appears in at least one subheading.
keyword_in_subheadings.error: Focus keyword is not found in subheadings.

keyword_density.success: Focus keyword density is between 1% and 1.5%.
keyword_density.warning: Focus keyword density is slightly low or slightly high (between 0.5%â€“0.99% or 1.51%â€“2.5%).
keyword_density.error: Focus keyword density is very low (under 0.5%) or too high (over 2.5%).

url_slug_length.description: URL slug contains a reasonable number of descriptive words
url_slug_length.error: URL slug contains less than 2 words or more than 6 words.

external_links.success: At least one external link is included.

dofollow_links.description: At least one external link with DoFollow found in your content
dofollow_links.success: A DoFollow external link is present.

internal_links.success: At least one internal link is included.

keyword_at_start.description: Focus keyword at the start of the SEO title
keyword_at_start.success: SEO title starts with the focus keyword.
keyword_at_start.error: Focus keyword is not at the beginning of the SEO title.

sentiment.description: Title has a positive or a negative sentiment
sentiment.error: SEO title lacks any emotional sentiment.

power_words.success: Title contains 2 or more power words.

short_paragraphs.error: Most paragraphs are long and hard to scan.

media_content.success: Content includes at least one image or video.
media_content.error: No images or videos included in content.
